solution_line_template: Betty's sister has {sister_fraction_more} * {betty_books} books = <<{sister_fraction_more}*{betty_books}={additional_sister_books}>>{additional_sister_books} more books.
The total number of books Betty's sister has is {betty_books} books + {additional_sister_books} books = <<{betty_books}+{additional_sister_books}={sister_total_books}>>{sister_total_books} books
The total number of books the two have is {sister_total_books} books + {betty_books} books = <<{sister_total_books}+{betty_books}={total_books}>>{total_books} books
